mapper.insert: insert into ${tableName} ( uid, image_url, image_path, upload_time, camera_id, lng, lat, vehicle_num, video_stream_id, image_type, presentation_time_stamp ) values ( #{uid} #{imageUrl}, #{imagePath}, #{uploadTime}, #{cameraId}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{vehicleNum}, #{videoStreamId}, #{imageType}, #{presentationTimeStamp} )

insert into ${vehicleInformationTableName} ( uid, position_info, order_number, vehicle_model_info, vehicle_vector, individuation_info, licence_plate, driving_behavior, image_id, image_table_name, create_time ) values
(#{item.uid}, #{item.positionInfo}, #{item.orderNumber}, #{item.vehicleModelInfo}, #{item.vehicleVector}, #{item.individuationInfo}, #{item.licencePlate}, #{item.drivingBehavior}, #{item.imageId} #{item.imageTableName} #{item.creatTime} )
